Articles.Content: I can't remember if this behavior is gone or not and I'm too lazy to go spelunking through the archives to find out. I'm guessing it ended with the fake aero of 0.95, but could some kind soul who knows off the top of their head please fill me in? I'm considering posting a glider range/time aloft challenge, but obviously if this exploit still exists it would be pointless to do so. Thanks!
I havent experienced any infinigliding since the new aero model.  Even fins from an exploded rocket (not mine, of course) dont really infiniglide anymore.
I haven't tested either, but I think the answer to your question is yes.
I will add that I havent exactly gone looking for it, so it could very well be around for all I know.  Dont listen to me.

Thanks for your replies. Hmm. Sounds like the waters are muddy.  Maybe soliciting for people to put it to the test in a challenge would at least be revealing, but I'm perdsonallly more interested in exploring this as a real challenge rather than as a bug hunt. I'll have to investigate and think on it more...
